campaign.story:
Help us Kickstart Keto Pint
They told us it wasn’t possible. 
They said you can’t make a great tasting ice cream without sugar.
They were wrong.
Creamy. Delicious. Satisfying. 
Ice Cream for your Keto Journey. 
About Us
We're Gabby & Chris, the founders of Keto Pint. We create innovative and healthy dessert options to fit into your everyday healthy lifestyle. Our mission is to reduce levels of cardiovascular disease by providing the lowest sugar dessert options on the market. Crowdfunding keeps us independent of outside investment, letting us prioritize revolutionary dessert innovation, customer satisfaction, and an extraordinary experience. 
Keto Pint was born due to our frustration with ice cream offerings while on our low carb, no added sugar diet. No ice cream was low enough in carbs and every low carb option had added sugar in the pints. We were determined to change that. So, we created the first premium, small batch, Keto Ice Cream, made with no added sugar.
First Micro-Creamery
We are the first Micro-Creamery in the U.S. based out of Portland, Oregon. This makes us different from all of our competitors. 
What is a Micro-Creamery
A Micro-Creamery refers to our small batch process of making our ice cream. We use a revolutionary long-time, long-term pasteurization process, which drastically changes the texture, quality and scoopability of our ice cream. You deserve the best and that is what we promise to provide you. You will definitely be able to taste our Micro-Creamery difference.
New York Times Recognized Product Development Team
The most humbling experience. Our Product Development Team was recently featured in a New York Times best selling article. The Times says our product development team has the “Million Dollar Palate”. 
So, you know we are in good hands when it comes to our product :)
The Keto Pint 
Flavorful, creamy, unique flavors, and ONLY 3g net carbs per serving (after doing our final nutrition panels, our ice cream will be 3g net carbs per serving and not 2g as stated in the video). We are making every Keto and Diabetics dream come true... ICE CREAM WITHOUT SUGAR! Don’t let the no added sugar deter you, we have been in development for the past 12 months to bring you the best tasting ice cream, packed with flavor. 
What unique flavors are we talking about? We are defying the odds of “traditional” flavors. Get ready for the #ketopint….
Keto Pint Flavors
Peanut Butter Brownie Dough
Mint Chocolate Chip
Maple Bacon
Chocolate Chunk
Sea Salt Caramel Swirl  
Butter Coffee 
Our Mission
It is our mission at Keto Pint to help reduce levels of cardiovascular disease in the world. We do this by providing the best no added sugar ice cream.
It is our goal to start growing our presence in early 2019. We will start by selling our product through our e-retail platform and then quickly expand within grocery stores. We already have connections with several large grocery chains and plan on utilizing these connections to get Keto Pint into these retailers.
Testimonials
 "Zero Added Sugar?! It tastes AMAZING!"
 Carolyn Ketchem (@fooddreamer) Testimonial 
 "Maple Bacon......this tastes like the BEST breakfast of your life!"
How to Pre-Order
1. Mobile: Tap "Rewards" button 
Desktop: Click the “BACK THIS PROJECT” button
2. Pick your pledge level and enter payment info 
That’s it! (We will get your ice cream flavor choice after the campaign is over)
You can either create an account, log in (if you already have a Kickstarter account), or use Guest Checkout. You can also use Guest Checkout to pledge for a friend or ship to another shipping address. 
*See FAQs below for more details 
Keto Pint Nutrition and Ingredients (by flavor)
Mint Chip:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Mint Base(Water, Spirulina Extract, Oregon Peppermint Oil, Natural Flavor, Organic Guar Gum, Turmeric Extract), Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Chocolate Chip(Raw Cocoa, Erythritol, Cocoa Butter, Sunflower Lecithin, Stevia Extract), Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia. 
Mint Chip Nutrition
Sea Salt Caramel Swirl:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Sea Salt Caramel Base(Water, Sea Salt, Natural Caramel Flavor, Annatto Extract, Organic Xanthan Gum), Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia.
Sea Salt Caramel Swirl Nutrition
Chocolate Chunk:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Dutch Raw Cocoa Powder, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Chocolate Chip(Raw Cocoa, Erythritol, Cocoa Butter, Sunflower Lecithin, Stevia Extract), Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia. 
Chocolate Chunk Nutrition
Maple Bacon:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Maple Base(Water, Natural Maple Flavor, Sea Salt, Organic Xanthan Gum), Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Bacon Bits(Pork, Water, Sea Salt, Smoke Flavor, Natural Flavor),Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia. 
Maple Bacon Nutrition
Coffee:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Coffee Base(Water, Columbian Coffee, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Natural Flavor), Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia.  
Coffee Nutrition
Peanut Butter Cup:
Organic Cream, Organic Whole Milk, Peanut Butter Base(Water, Peanuts, Sea Salt, Natural Flavor), Whole Egg, Milk Protein Concentrate, Non-GMO Chicory Root Fiber, Monk Fruit Extract, Non-GMO Tapioca Fiber, Vegetable Glycerin, Erythritol, Brownie(Organic Palm Oil, Erythritol, Oat Fiber, Sunflower Seed, Cocoa Powder, Sunflower Seed Butter, Sunflower Oil, Water, Monk Fruit, Stevia, Sea Salt, Pure Vanilla Extract, Natural Flavor), Stevia Extract, Sea Salt, Non-GMO Guar Gum, Non-GMO Gum Acacia. 
PB Brownie Nutrition
All of our products will be Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, No Added Sugar, No Corn, No Soy, and No Artificial Ingredients.   
 Comparison To Competitors   
Timeline
August 28, 2018 - Launch Kickstarter Campaign
September 26, 2018 - Kickstarter Campaign Closes 
December 2018 - Run Production on the Keto Pint (ALL FLAVORS)
December 2018/January 2019 - Send out all Kickstarter Orders
January 2019 - Website goes live for all new orders 
**we will clearly communicate if this timeline changes 
What we will use the money for
We gratefully appreciate your support by backing our campaign! We will be using the funds for the following: ordering pint packaging, ordering ingredients, running all flavors on commercial equipment, custom shipping boxes, and shipping out orders (i.e. insulated coolers, dry ice, shipping fees).
And Now for the Big Question
Are you ready to back this project? 
Step 1: Back this Project Now
Click the ‘Back this Project’ button at the top of this page!
Step 2: Pick a Reward
You’ll choose your specific ice cream flavors after the project ends, so don’t worry about that for now. 
 Thank You 
Crowdfunding allows us to craft revolutionary dessert products without compromise and run a company that we are proud to own. We owe our existence to our backers, who will be helping us transform the ice cream industry and re-think the term “healthy”. We imagine a world where no added sugar products take over, without compromising quality and taste. We can’t thank you enough. Your support will transform not only our company, but also the world in which we live. Help us re-define the ice cream industry. Thank you #ketopintfam. 
Keto Love,
Gabby & Chris
FAQ's
1. Will you have non dairy options?
The Keto Pint will launch as a dairy based product. The Keto Pint team plans to launch its first Non-Dairy ice cream in Fall of 2019. We place the utmost importance on those that find difficulty digesting dairy based products, and look forward to serving the Non-Dairy community next year! 
2. When will the ice cream ship out?
The Keto Pint will begin shipping in December 2018/January 2019. Keto Pint will ship directly to your door, right in time for the best Keto Christmas Present anyone could ask for! =)
3. What are you using the money for?
We will be using the money pledged for the following:
Order our first round of pint packaging from our pint suppliers
Pay for raw materials, making up the individual ingredients of the Keto Pint
Pay our Co-packer for manufacturing our ice cream and storing our finished goods in a local cold storage facility
Pay for shipping boxes, dry ice, and Fed-Ex 2 Day Ground Shipping in order to deliver our product to each of you as quick as possible!
4. How do I pledge money to your campaign? 
It’s Simple! The Keto Pint offers 10 different pledge amounts, ranging from $5 - $1,000. The more you pledge, the more you get! Pledge offers are available on the right side of the screen. To select a pledge offering, highlight your mouse cursor over the pledge offering and click “Select This Reward.” From here, enter your pledge amount and click continue. 
A few months later, the Keto Pint will arrive on your doorstep! 
5. Will these be available in grocery stores?
The Keto Pint will not be available in grocery stores until 2019. We look forward to the opportunity of launching Keto Pint across the nation as soon as possible. In order to do so, we need your help! 
Share Keto Pint with your community by following us on Social Media (Instagram and Facebook, @ketopint), and share our Kickstarter campaign with your Keto Community! 
Once you receive your Keto Pints, start making amazing Keto recipes and share it with the world =)
6. What is Keto Ice Cream? 
Keto Ice Cream is an ice cream that follows the macro nutritional values of a keto based diet. Keto Ice Cream uses an ice cream base that has low net carbs, high fat, and no added sugar, while maintaining impeccable flavor and texture. 
The Keto Pint uses ingredients that PHDs and Dietary Nutritionists recommend for a Keto Based Diet including Unadulterated Heavy Cream, Erythritol, Monk Fruit Extract, Stevia, Whole Eggs, and Chicory Root Fiber. 
It is critical to select food that has not been processed and tampered to ensure its nutritional integrity. That is why all of our products will be Gluten Free, Non-GMO, Organic, No Added Sugar, No Corn, No Soy, and No Artificial Ingredients.  
7. What is Keto and how will it benefit me?
As explained by Scott Keatley, R.D. of Keatley Medical Nutrition Therapy, states Keto “is all about minimizing your carbs and upping your fats to get your body to use fat as a form of energy. While everyone's body and needs are slightly different, that typically translates to: 60-75% of your calories from fat, 15-30% of your calories from protein, and 5-10% of your calories from carbs.”
The predominant storage for energy comes in the form of sugar and carbohydrates, which our body transforms into Glucose. This form of energy, glucose, is use and stored as glycogen in liver and muscle tissue.
The goal of Keto is to put our bodies into a state of Ketosis, a normal metabolic process that shifts our energy source from glucose to ketones. Ketones are an alternative energy source when you don’t have enough insulin in your body to turn glucose into energy. Instead, your liver turns fat into a secondary energy source, called Ketones. 
There have been many studies conducted on the benefits of the Keto Diet, which include, but not limited to:
Weight Loss by suppressing appetite 
Increased Sustainable Energy
Increased levels of HDL (“Good” Cholestrol
Reduced blood sugar and insulin level (Improve Diabetes)
Decreased Blood Pressure
Reduce metabolic disorders
Eliminates Cancer Cells
We highly recommend reading the following articles explaining the various research conducted on the Ketogenic diet and its various benefits:
Ketogenic Diet Basics: https://www.womenshealthmag.com/weight-loss/a19434332/what-is-the-keto-diet/
Keto Diet, A Dietician’s Perspective: http://theconversation.com/keto-diet-a-dietitian-on-what-you-need-to-know-99867  
Keto Diet Transformations: https://www.popsugar.com/fitness/Keto-Diet-Weight-Loss-Transformation-44173272
Keto Diet Benefits: https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/319196.php
Keto Diet Increases Memory: https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/319287.php
Ketogenic Diet Helps Endurance Performance: https://www.perfectketo.com/use-ketogenic-diet-physical-performance/
8. Why do you incorporate additional protein?
The Keto Diet is known for being low-carb, high fat. But what about protein?
Protein is a building block of life, essential amino acids necessary for any diet. Protein is critical for:
Building muscle mass through protein synthesis
Cutting Body fat and building lean muscle
Skin and Bone health
Healthy Brain Function
Reduce appetite and hunger
Boost metabolism and increase fat burning
Many ketogenic dieters are fearful that excess protein will kick them out of a state of ketosis, however, protein WILL NOT affect Ketone levels. 
The Keto Pint team places a large importance on nutritional components that make healthy living as easy as possible. We believe that a healthy diet can change the trajectory of one’s life, and protein is a vital source that sustains critical bodily functioning to its optimal state! 
For more information, please read the following article: https://www.perfectketo.com/how-too-much-protein-is-bad-for-ketosis/
9. How do you ship ice cream without it melting? 
Keto pints are shipped in an insulated box with a block of dry ice. Considering dry ice has a temperature of -109 degrees Fahrenheit, this will keep your decadent ice cream frozen while in transit.

   To ensure your ice cream arrives frozen, we ship via two-day delivery to all 50 states.

   What’s better than having ice cream arrive at your front door? And the crowd went silent…
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any new product development, considerable risks must be acknowledged, including, but not limited to:

1. Finding a commercialized Co-Packer with experience in like-minded products
2. Scaling an ice cream recipe from small batch to commercialized batch
3. Not being able to source ingredients on a large scale
4. Miscalculation of overrun percentage when producing ice cream for the first time
5. Pint suppliers delay the approval of packaging designs and color schema
6. Complications in LTL shipping from Co-Packer’s facility to Cold Storage, resulting in obsolete inventory 
7. Issues with Direct-To-Consumer shipping, as Dry Ice has the potential of melting before shipment is received

We have taken the following measures in order to remediate any potential issues arising above:

1. The Keto Pint Team has structured an agreement with Alpenrose Dairy, a family owned dairy since 1916, that has produced ice cream for over 50 years, including Baskin Robbins! In addition, our team has over two years of experience in producing remarkable ice cream.

2. The Keto Pint team has worked with one of the nation’s most notable product development experts who has been featured in the NY Times best selling article! She has scaled over 15 companies from homemade, to commercialization, and has not experienced any issues along the way. 

3. The Keto Pint team has partnered with an ingredient sourcing team that blends and agitates our unique formulation, offering a turn-key solution for our Co-Packers to use on site. We have two years of experience sourcing the best, all natural ingredients, and will provide the same operational processes to the Keto Pint.

4. As mentioned in #2, we have worked with one of the nation’s most notable product development experts to ensure our overrun and viscosity is precisely calculated. We feel confident in our ability to determine the correct overrun to ensure the best tasting Keto ice cream! 

5. The Keto Pint has outsourced its pint packaging design to a Portland Graphic Designer that has over 10 years of experience designing and developing like minded packaging for other product lines. In addition, the Keto Pint team has all of the connections and templates in place to ensure appropriate approval is received by our pint suppliers. 

6. The Keto Pint team will utilize an LTL Carrier with over twenty years of experience in order to ship our Keto Ice Cream in -20 degrees, to ensure product integrity and quality in route to our cold storage facility. 

7. We have partnered with a local E-retailer who has over five years of experience in shipping Frozen related products to end consumers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Working in collaboration with the Critical Role cast, Steamforged Games has designed and developed an exciting range of high-quality miniatures that bring the legendary heroes of Vox Machina and the Mighty Nein to life. Perfectly scaled for roleplaying, the PVC miniatures come fully pre-assembled and ready to paint and play right out the box.
Critical Role is a weekly livestreamed roleplaying game set in Exandria, which is the world created by veteran voice actor and Dungeon Master, Matthew Mercer. Each week, Matthew leads his friends (also fellow voice actors!) on epic adventures.  
The first Critical Role campaign centered on the ragtag group of heroes in Tal'Dorei known as Vox Machina — Pike Trickfoot, the Gnome Cleric, Keyleth, the Half-Elf Druid, Percival “Percy” Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo, the Human Gunslinger, Grog Strongjaw, the Goliath Barbarian, Scanlan Shorthalt the Gnome Bard, Taryon “Tary” Darrington, the Human Artificer, Vex’ahlia (and her animal companion, a bear named Trinket), the Half-Elf Ranger and Vax’ildan, the Half-Elf Rogue. The first campaign ended in November 2017 after 115 episodes and 373 hours of gameplay.
Critical Role is now in its second campaign, in which the Mighty Nein begin their adventures together in Wildemount. The Mighty Nein consists of Yasha, the Aasimar Barbarian, Beauregard, the Human Monk, Mollymauk Tealeaf, the Tiefling Blood Hunter, Fjord, the Half-Orc Warlock, Nott the Brave, the Goblin Rogue, Jester, the Tiefling Cleric, and Caleb Widogast, the Human Wizard. Shakäste, a human cleric, has proven himself to be a trusted ally of the Mighty Nein.
Vox Machina Party
From Tal’Dorei they hail. Whether cleansing the underdark of an aberrant scourge or preventing a would-be god from destroying the globe, this motley troupe of wayward souls - Keyleth, Vax'ildan, Vex’ahlia (and Trinket!), Grog, Scanlan, Percy & Pike - are the greatest heroes the world of Exandria has ever seen.
Mighty Nein Party
Fjord, Beau, Caleb, Nott, Jester, Mollymauk, Yasha, and their ally Shakäste... names that breed fear into the hearts of Wildemount’s foulest foes. On a mission for fortune and glory, these fledgling adventurers may one day be the saviors of the Dwendalian Empire - if they can outrun the shadows of their storied pasts.
CRITTERS PLEDGE $60/£45
We anticipate that many of you looking at this Kickstarter are brand new to crowd-funding. Which means we took the decision to keep things as simple as we can. Historically most Kickstarter projects tend to charge a little bit more for the initial offering than they strictly need to and then ‘bump’ up the perceived value through stretch goals and other complicated ideas like that…it can end up being very daunting to work out what pledge levels go with what and how much you need to commit etc. 
So to avoid this confusion, for this Kickstarter we have simply given you one pledge level at an amazingly good price. This means that pledge level already includes all the Kickstarter exclusives and no Stretch Goals will be available during the campaign. What you see, is what you get...simple! 
However, the world of Exandria is a rich and detailed place with many wonderful characters worthy of making into miniatures. Rest assured, this is just the beginning of this journey for all of us...and don't forget, we're all ridiculously excited about this project and working hand in hand with CR over the coming years to bring the for world of Tal'dorei to your homes. And hey, who knows what random encounters might happen over the course of the KS campaign. 
So just one question remains: How do you want to do this?
Caleb Widogast and Frumpkin
After investing heavily in our advanced miniatures development pipeline and working closely with carefully selected manufacturing partners, the quality and detail produced in our industry-leading miniatures is simply world-class. 
Kickstarter Exclusive miniatures
Every highly-detailed mini is a fully pre-assembled PVC model, ready to paint and play straight out the box.
Shipping will be charged after the Kickstarter finishes based on actual costs incurred to ship and is collected via our pledge manager system. This allows us to charge fairly for all backers and avoid a 'one size fits all' mentality to shipping. 
We will ship your pledges to several hubs around the world at our cost. Your pledge will arrive via one of the following hubs: 
• United Kingdom (UK and Rest of the World backers)
• USA (US backers)
• Canada (Canada backers)
• Germany (EU backers)
• China (Asia Pacific backers)
• Australia (Australia and New Zealand backers) 
Below are our initial rough estimates for shipping the sets (2kg volumetric weight). These are just estimates, and may change: 
• UNITED KINGDOM: £6. Channel Islands, Highlands and NI £6-£13 
• USA: £7-£11 to the contiguous US and the US Virgin Islands. £17-20 to Alaska, Hawaii, and Puerto Rico. 
• CANADA: £7-£15 to most cities. 
• EUROPE: £8-£20 to most countries. £20-£30 to non-EU countries. 
• LATIN AMERICA: £25-£40 to most countries. 
• ASIA: £15-£25 to most countries.
• OCEANIA: £9-£18 to Australia and New Zealand. 
• AFRICA/OTHER: £25-£50 to most countries. 
Any pledges confirmed after our pledge manager deadline will be shipped from the UK hub at a later date and will likely incur increased shipping costs.
Below is the general schedule once the Kickstarter ends so you know when to expect money to be taken and our overall shipping plan. Again these are estimates: 
Kickstarter Campaign Ends 
• 0 Day – Pledges are charged. 
• 1 Week – Survey sent confirming emails. 
• 1-2 Months – Pledge Manager sent to backers taking payment for shipping. 
• 1 Month Before Shipping – Pledge Manager deadline - any late confirmations after this deadline will be shipped from the UK after all other pledges are completed and may incur additional cost. 
Shipping Starts 
• 0 Days – China starts packing EU/AUS/US hub orders. UK/RoW orders are sent to the UK hub by sea freight. 
• 2-5 Weeks – China begins packing and shipping Asian hub orders. 
• 6-8 Weeks – UK hub receives items and begins packing and shipping to backers 
• 9-12 Weeks - EU/AUS/US hubs receive items, ship everything out to backers within 2 weeks. 
• 13+ Weeks – UK hub completes shipping of the UK and RoW orders.
Late confirmation orders and customer service requests for missing/broken items are dealt with via support@steamforged.com. We are unable to ship to PO Boxes.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
====== 
Licence 
======

The Critical Role miniature range has been developed by Steamforged Games Ltd with full support and license from the Critical Role team and cast.

Products presented on this Kickstarter page and during the campaign may be subject to change in order to meet the expectations of the Critical Role license agreement.

By pledging on this Kickstarter you acknowledge that the final look and contents of the pledges may change and differ from what is presented at the start of the campaign.

========= 
Challenges 
=========

This is our fifth Kickstarter project, the previous projects being Guild Ball, Dark Souls™: The Board Game, Resident Evil The Board Game and Godtear. Several of those titles have achieved award-winning success both on Kickstarter and in retail.

We are fully aware of potential delays that may happen with products that are produced in China, the common ones being delays in production, shipping, and customs.

We have estimated the delivery for March 2019, but please understand this is only an estimate. Due to the global logistics involved in shipping, some regions may receive their pledges sooner than others.

We have prepared as much as possible with our production for a successful Kickstarter; however, we will refund pledges if for some unforeseen reason the product cannot be delivered at all.

======= 
Refunds 
=======

Refunds may be given within 60 days of the campaign ending, including fees. After that time, refunds may be given minus the Kickstarter and payment processing fees, as we will not be able to claim those back after 60 days.

We are unable to issue refunds once we have begun the packaging and shipment stages of the project (around 6–8 weeks before the actual shipping date).

Refunds within 60 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit/debit card. Refunds after 60 days of the campaign ending are processed via PayPal only.

This is a GBP Kickstarter and refunds will be processed in GBP for the amount received, excluding any applicable fees dependent on the day on which the refund is processed as detailed above.

================= 
Terms and Conditions 
=================

If you do not confirm your shipping and pledge details within 10 weeks of our notification via email to confirm them, your pledge will be treated as abandoned. We will, however, look at each case sympathetically and try our best to satisfy each customer.

By pledging on this Kickstarter you agree that our responsibility to you is for shipping your order as entered into the pledge management system. You are responsible for import or other duties that may be payable to relevant tax authorities. You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your pledge being unable to be delivered or lost in transit.

If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Kickstarter project and wait for the global general release.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The most effective and interesting parties contain a variety of characters: characters with different alignments and goals, characters with personalities that clash and resonate in unexpected ways, and characters with stories worth retelling again and again. These stories can include sorcerers with dark secrets, rogues who covertly steal from paladins and clerics, or waifs who fall in love with high elf nobles. Parties that create conflict, fascination, and spectacle are built out of contrasts and compliments.
Here are the miniatures planned so far!
With the Stonehaven Adventurers 2018 project, we are creating Adventuring Parties that have a mix of races and classes. We want to make a lot of miniatures, so we will be adding additional minis via stretch goals as the total pledge amount grows. The minis can be added individually with prices dependent on size. 
Human, dwarf, half-elf, and owlfolk sized miniatures: $5
Kobold and goblin sized miniatures: $4
Grippli, mechanical, and child sized miniatures: $3
Dwarf riding a Yak sized miniatures: $12
The miniatures will be made of 100% lead free pewter, and some assembly will be required. They will be sculpted on the standard 28 mm scale. Round bases will be included. 
And now we present your Adventuring Parties!
Pictured from left to right: Male Human Ranger, Male Goblin Archer, Female Human Sorcerer, Female Grippli Druid, Male Human Adept.
When the west gate was breached, a handful of citizens held the gap for hours while the city's beleaguered engineers moved the chevaux de frise into place. The survivors of that fateful day still meet yearly at the Westgate Tavern to commiserate and remember those who fell. 
Pictured from left to right: Male Kobold Monk, Male Human Berserker, Male Owlfolk Wizard, Male Grippli Mage, Female Half-elf Monk.
Ever since the hordes of Orcs swarmed from the great city following the call of the All-Render, Ermcrest, once an Orcish slum, has become a haven for criminals and others seeking to avoid the watchful eyes of the law. Despite the borough's ill-repute, efforts are being made to establish a semblance of order. The Ermcrest Volunteer Watch does its best to keep the peace, to little effect.
Pictured from left to right: Female Human Thief, Female Half-Elf Witch with Ferret, Male Owlfolk Rogue, Male Kobold Fighter, Male Dwarf Ranger.
The Skull Stabbers are a ragtag group of thieves and would-be assassins looking to make a name for themselves. Assembled by the now infamous Ralph the Old, they are available for hire to stab things, especially skulls, and all at a budget rate!
Pictured from left to right: Male Human Loremaster, Mechanical Berserker, Female Owlfolk Fighter, Mechanical Wizard, and Female Half-Elf Cleric.
For those in need of extra security (. . .against the Skull Stabbers?), the Protection Services Adventuring Party can act as bodyguards and consultants. They take your security seriously, because if you die, they are contractually obligated to offer a full refund to your surviving relatives.
Pictured from left to right: Male Human Hireling, Male Kobold Warrior, Female Human Elementalist, Male Human Guardsman, and Female Human Apprentice.
The Silent Eye watches all. It observes, learning from its surroundings and from the acts of others. The Temples of the Silent Eye are open to all who seek healing or wisdom, for what is learned should be shared and used for good. The members of The Silent Eye Adventuring Party seek to do just that: to learn through observation and to apply that knowledge, increasing the goodness of the world. Is there some sinister element secretly directing the actions of this outwardly virtuous group for their own nefarious purposes? Probably.
This last group is not officially a party, but you can get them all by pledging for the Completionist 2018 reward! You can also get them as individual add-ons!
Pictured from left to right: Male DwarvenTeifling, Owlfolk Child Archer (locked), Male Dwarven Wizard, Yak Mount, Male Mounted Dwarf Brewmaster, Male Dwarven Musician, Owlfolk Child Mechanist, Male Grippli Undead.
We've already reached a lot of stretch goals! Here are the ones that are coming up soon:
We reached $18,125! Celinia Di Loreto the Female Human Apprentice will be added to the Silent Eye Adventuring Party and is available to add to your reward as a single mini ($5.00). Celinia entered the service of the Silent Eye as a child. Although she is now of age to join the Sisterhood, she is still very much a child in many ways.
We reached $18,750! Serra Kayakomsin, Half-Elf Cleric, will be added to the Protection Services Adventuring Party and available to add to your reward as a single mini ($5.00). Who is Serra Kayakomsin? The Kayakomsin family has run the Strymian smuggling tunnels for generations, growing rich and powerful from their ill-gotten gains. Serra has left that life for one of faith, but sometimes skeletons just won't stay in the closet. That's what turn undead is for I guess.
We reached $19,375! Halfdan Borgarson, Male Human Guardsman, will added to the Silent Eye Adventuring Party and is available to add to your reward as a single mini ($5.00). While fighting in the Dark War, Halfdan was taken prisoner by drow mercenaries. Seven months later he was spotted in the upper tunnels, wide-eyed and feral. Though weaponless, it took five dwarven patrolmen to subdue him. Servants of the Silent Eye took pity on Halfdan and brought him to their sanctuaries, where they have begun to heal his shattered mind.
We reached $20,000! The remaining members of The Silent Eye have been unlocked!  They are available to add individually to your reward as well. This ]includes the Male Human Hireling ($5.00), The Male Kobold Warrior ($4.00), and the Female Human Elementalist ($5.00).
We reached $21,000! Brewmaster Grymm, Male Mounted Dwarf Brewmaster and Esmeralda, Yak Mount, have been added to the Completionist 2018 reward level and available to add to your reward for $12(combined). The pair will count as 2 miniatures for the purposes of rewards and will come as separate parts. Brewmaster Grymm and Esmeralda make a formidable fighting team with Grymm hurling insults and carefully brewed ales and Esmeralda pretty much destroying everything in their path. 
We reached $23,000! Jedrian Earthbreaker the Male Dwarven Wizard has been added to the Completionist 2018 reward level and available to add to your project as a single miniature ($5.00). From a young age, Jedrian felt the call of the stone. Like decent dwarves, his parents steered him away from the arcane. But the lure of the ancient knowledge was too strong, and the voice of the mountain could not be ignored.
We reached $25,000! Darvinius Winderchime, Male Dwarven Musician, has been added to the Completionist 2018 Reward level and is available to add to your reward as a single miniature for $5. When Darvinius first laid his hands on a harp as a mere child of ten, it was as if he already had the knowledge that only years of practice can acquire. Minutes later, he had stolen that harp (having lulled the original owners into a peaceful slumber with his newly-discovered harpsical prowess!).
We reached $27,500! Orvinir Relsch, Male Dwarven Tiefling, has been added to the Completionist Set and is available to add to your reward as a single mini ($5.00). Orvinir's bloodline has been cursed through their mercantile dealings with the infernal plane. That being said, Orvinir is the first in a long time to manifest the curse physically, and the rest of the family is doing extremely well for themselves.
We reached $30,000! Growp Bogwader, the Male Grippli Undead, has been added to the Completionist Set and will be available to add to your reward as a single mini ($3.00). Growp isn't one of the angry dead, but he is mildly perturbed. The afterlife was quite comfortable after all. 
We reached $34,000! the Owlfolk Child Mechanist has been unlocked, added to the Completionist 2018 reward, and made available as a $3.00 add-on. 
When we reach $35,000, the Owlfolk Child Archer will be added to the Completionist 2018 reward and made available to be added to your reward as a single mini ($3.00).
As usual, we will add more goals as these ones are met!
Here are some of the miniatures whose initial sculpting is close to being done:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While we are fairly familiar with the process of sculpting and casting miniatures by now, there is still some risk that our project will be significantly delayed by factors beyond our control. To mitigate this, we will be working with manufacturers that are here in the United States that we have worked with in the past for the work that we do not directly do/supervise ourselves. Additionally, a large amount of the sculpting of these miniatures has already been completed.

We will do everything we can to make sure that the miniatures are to our backers by the date indicated on the reward, but our top priority in relation to the project is ensuring that the miniatures are of the highest possible quality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hi, my name is Jon Pointer and I’m the creator of the DoorAjar, and founder of Pointer Solutions, LLC. We are a very small family business in Fort Collins, CO.
The DoorAjar replaces the normal strike plate on an interior door and allows the door to be easily secured in two positions - slightly ajar and fully closed.  The part requires only the two normal strike plate mounting screws and allows the door to be opened and closed like normal.  Though simple, the DoorAjar holds the door very securely in the slightly ajar position - the door can't be pushed open or closed by a pet or person.
DoorAjar in place of normal strike plate
PLAY

Background
The idea for the DoorAjar came from a very simple need - gerbils and cats.  We wanted our youngest son's door open for air circulation, but closed to keep the cats away from the gerbil cage.  Also, we wanted to be able to easily close the door at night for fire safety.  I needed to find a way to easily latch the door in two positions - slightly open and the normal closed position. I was disappointed to find that the solutions available on the market were complicated and clunky. All of the solutions required a strap that had to be disconnected, a jamb that had to be moved, or an extension that had to be removed to allow the door to close fully. There were no solutions that allowed you to simply close the door in two different positions.  
We started experimenting with different prototypes - gluing together strike plates, designing on our home computer, and endless plastic prototypes on our 3D printer.  We love the process of inventing! 
Many design iterations and prototypes
Eventually we landed on an incredibly simple, patent pending, one piece design. To mount it, you simply remove the standard strike plate screws and use the same two screws to attach the DoorAjar in its place. The design allows you to secure the door either fully closed or slightly open simply by turning the doorknob - no other motions or steps are needed. While simple looking, the shape and angles of the product are quite exact and required a lot of design and iteration to allow the DoorAjar to function properly. The flexible material means that you can accidentally run into the DoorAjar without breaking it or injuring yourself.   
PLAY

Keep the Pets Out and the Air Moving
Our testers have found two primary uses for the DoorAjar: keeping pets out of a room and maintaining good air flow.   Perhaps you have...
A room that you’d like closed off, but you want the door slightly open to maintain air flow and keep the room from getting stale - like a spare bedroom or laundry room 
A house with roommates where you’d like to close the door for some privacy, but not be totally closed off
A dog or cat that you need to keep out of a room
A bedroom that you’d like to have a little open during the day, but able to easily close at night.
Once you have a DoorAjar, you realize how nice it is to have two possible closed positions.   
Our Project Goal  
With our design complete and prototypes working in many homes of friends and family, all we need now is a true injection molded part. This will help us reduce the cost, further improve the material properties, and allow us to make higher quantities. That is where this Kickstarter project comes in. We are raising enough money to pay for the injection molding tooling and to run the needed number of parts. It’s important to us to produce the product locally, so we’ve partnered with a local tool maker and molder here in northern Colorado and have secured a quote for our mold tooling and parts. Once our goal is reached, the tooling will be ordered and parts will be ready to ship in 6-8 weeks.  
About Colors  
We plan to produce the DoorAjar in two colors that you can choose from in the Rewards - "White" and "Nickel" (for a plastic approximation of Brushed Nickel).
Prototypes 
You'll notice two versions of the DoorAjar in our videos and pictures - a slightly transparent and "rough" version, and a white, precise, and well-formed version.  The white version is a purchased stereolithography (SLA) part that we purchased to check exact dimensions and show what the final molded parts will look like.  The slightly rough, slightly transparent versions are fused deposition modeling (FDM) parts. They are printed on our 3D printer at home out of a flexible and tough nylon that is closer to the functionality of the final part.  Our 3D printer was critical in developing the exact shape and material choice to get just the function of the DoorAjar that we wanted.  
SLA and FDM Prototypes
European Customers
Given interest from Europe, I've added this shipping option.  Note that shipping to Europe adds $11 and make sure to check your door hardware to ensure that the DoorAjar will work.  
Thank You!
We hope you’ve enjoyed hearing about our project. We’re confident that you’ll find the DoorAjar very useful in unexpected ways, just as we have. Thank you very much for your support and please pass this along to friends and family.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The primary risk for our project will be with the injection molding tooling. Though we have secured a good quote and met with the company producing the mold tooling and parts, there can always be unforeseen difficulties in making a molded part. The difficulties can raise the cost and/or cause delays to the schedule. We'll do everything we can to work closely with the supplier to minimize this risk.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Backers!
The special nylon we use to print the DoorAjar is also available in black.  We heard from some of you that you'd prefer black to match your current door hardware.  So, we got a spool and we're all set now!  Head to our Etsy page and check it out!
https://www.etsy.com/listing/630672553/doorajar-a-simple-3d-printed-strike

Hello Everyone!
DoorAjar is now available on Etsy!
https://www.etsy.com/listing/630672553/doorajar-a-simple-3d-printed-strike
Thanks again for your interest during our Kickstarter campaign!  Unfortunately, we found that Kickstarter wasn't the path for us, but it was an excellent opportunity to get the word out there and receive great feedback from our backers.

Hello Everyone! First and foremost, let me say thank you for your interest in DoorAjar! Sadly the end is drawing near and we are far, far from our goal. It was a fun and valuable learning process, but it looks like this won't be the path for bringing the DoorAjar to the world. Instead, what I will be doing is pursuing a more reliable and higher quality way of 3D printing the parts. The parts we make today are perfectly functional, but they are difficult to produce and require a lot of post operations. Once the new method is in place I will contact all backers, directing them to where the parts can be purchased if interested. So, if you are interested, go ahead and back the project so that I can contact you afterwards with the information.  Thank you once again for your interest and I hope to get an incredibly useful DoorAjar in your hands as soon as possible. Thanks!  Jon

campaign.story:
A mysterious world of dark and light exists just around the corner! Enter the Feyland and discover strange new creatures! We're making a full-color, hardcover book (and PDF version) filled with 100 5E monsters from the Feyland! These monsters will be usable in many other environments. Each monster will be illustrated by fantasy/comic artist Travis Hanson. 
The Monsters of Feyland hardcover book will be approximately 108 pages long, packed with different kinds of monsters. Each monster will have a color illustration, stat block, and background information. Many of the monsters will be fey, but other types of monsters will also be included. There will be arch fey, brownies, centaurs, dragons, elves, faeries, giants, gnomes, goblins, hags, magical trees, nymphs, unicorns, witches, undead, and much more. The collection of creatures will also include a wide range of challenge ratings. Here are some examples of the monsters in their initial phases:
The Black Unicorn
The Fey Ranger
The Winged Goblin
Sketch of the next monster, The Skeleton King
Inked version of the Skeleton King
The newest creature, the Skeleton King!
Sketch of Frog Witch
Inked Version of Frog Witch
Color version of the Frog Witch
Sketch of the Fey Dragon
Inked version of the Fey Dragon
Final version of the Fey Dragon
Travis Hanson will be doing all the illustrations, including the cover and all the monsters. He is well-known for his Life of the Party and Bean comics. His last Kickstarter was the Life of the Party/Role For Initative book: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/488571414/life-of-the-party-role-for-initiative. Travis has 17 years of professional experience and was nominated for an Eisner award in 2011. He also worked with us on our last Kickstarter, World of Myrr Adventures Vol 2.
A few different levels can receive a 5E adventure module for levels 1-3. This PDF will be about 40 pages long and provide enough resources to run a sandbox style game. It will include monsters from the Monsters in Feyland collection.
The Adventurer and Legend level backers will receive a book of a dozen maps with a fey theme. The settings will include forests, caverns, and buildings. These full-color, detailed maps will come in a PDF.
The Legend level backers will receive a PDF with twenty detailed 5E NPCs that will fit into any fey themed adventure. Each character will have a stat block and a bio that includes a backstory, personality, bond, ideal, flaw, and equipment.
$23,000 - CAMPAIGN SETTING (UNLOCKED!). All backers will receive the Naern 5E campaign setting, a 100 page PDF detailing the third continent in the World of Myrr. The Feyland overlaps with Naern, the homeland of the elves. This book will detail the deities, factions, settlements, history, geography, and other elements of the setting.
$24,000 - CUSTOM-MADE D20 (UNLOCKED!). All backers who receive the hardcover book will also receive a custom-made d20 from Q-Workshop. It will be either black and white or black and yellow, with our griffon logo on the '20'. Q-Workshop is a well-known dice company based in Poland.
Custom-made d20s
Custom-made d20s
$26,000 - ADVENTURE MODULE (UNLOCKED!). All backers will receive a 5E adventure (levels 4-6) PDF. It will be at least 40 pages long and provide resources to play a sandbox style game. Monsters from the Monsters of Feyland collection will be included.
We have created two well-received 5E softcover books along with over 25 other 5E products. After two years of creating, we're ready to take the next step and create a high-quality hardcover book.
New EN World article mentions our project: http://www.enworld.org/forum/content.php?5089-RPG-Crowdfunding-News-089-Emissary-Lost-Flying-Circus-Monsters-of-Feyland-Freedom-Squadron-Liminal-Chernobyl-Mon-Amour-Protocol-Tabletop-Relic-Pins
A review of one our of 5E adventures:
https://thekindgm.wordpress.com/2017/06/10/dms-guild-review-the-wizard-higgs/
A review of our first Kickstarter and the World of Myrr campaign setting
https://deathbymage.com/2017/07/14/death-by-review-cawood-publishing-from-myrr-to-between-dungeons/
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are risks to everything. Professional editing is very expensive and time consuming. The prices for artwork and printing have increased so we had to add some shipping costs. Our last two Kickstarters were right on budget and close to the delivery date. To make sure this project is on time, the timeline is longer as the art alone will be time consuming. We feel the budget and timelines are appropriate.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Each of the last two years we've run Kickstarters to produce two sets of imaginative dice, the Warrior Set and the Wizard Set, and thanks to your support they are now both a reality! Both are now available (in limited quantities) from PolyHero.com.
Now it's time for a new set of dice to emerge from the shadows! The Rogue Set is once again the classic 7-piece set of RPG dice (plus a special Kickstarter bonus - see below).
As soon as we hit the funding goal we "unlocked" (both literally and thematically) a special "lock and pick" set, that you can buy as an add-on to your pledge. 
You will be able to choose your colors after the campaign with a pledge manager we will send you. Check out the FAQ at the bottom of this page for more information.
           All color options have been unlocked! The following Rogue Set colors will be available to select after the campaign! 
                Adventure Colors only available directly through PolyHero
  Adventure Colors only available directly through PolyHero
                   PLAY

     PLAY

Stay tuned for more sneaky surprises!
Click here to view and download hi-res versions of the images from Dropbox. 
Prototyping and Development
The Rogue Set was developed over many months, during which we conceived and iterated on numerous concepts, drawing on our own ideas and feedback posted by backers of the Wizard Set campaign. The final designs were settled on with the theme of the dice in mind, but importantly also with considerations of functionality and manufacture.

We felt that the lockpick was the quintessential rogue item, and we iterated through several completely separate approaches to creating a die inspired by it. In the end we struck on an idea that we felt had the right level of fun and uniqueness to it, and developed the lock and pick die as its own more elaborate and special item.
  PLAY

Credits
Dice concepts, design and modelling: Dann May and Greg May
Promotional images and videos: Greg May
Kickstarter Manager: Brenna Noonan
Produced by: PolyHero Dice
Thank You For Helping Us Run An Awesome Campaign
We're so happy to be here on Kickstarter building and growing our community. We love the direct engagement with you, the backers, and the opportunity to build projects together and bring them to reality. To that end, we strictly adhere to the Kickstarter Community Guidelines. If you violate the Community Guidelines by being a jerk or spamming the campaign, we will refund in full and cancel your pledge and you will not be eligible to receive any rewards from the campaign. We encourage open discussion but we draw the line at abusive language and behavior. Thank you to the vast majority of our backer community who are respectful and thank you in advance for helping us follow Kickstarter's Community Guidelines and maintain and grow a respectful community on this campaign and across Kickstarter.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
PolyHero Dice has created and completed two major sets of PolyHero Dice: The Warrior Set and The Wizard Set.

Our team has delivered hundreds of successful Kickstarter products since 2012, including our own published titles and those we've helped independent publishers run and fulfill. While printing, shipping, and processing delays are always a possibility, we have set a reasonable delivery date based on our experience.

Refunds
If you'd like a refund before your item ships, you have until one week before the scheduled ship date to request one. We can offer you a 90% refund since Kickstarter retains about 10% of your pledge for various fees. If there is something wrong with your item, we appreciate the opportunity to replace or exchange it. If a refund is preferred and there is no defect with the product, you'll be responsible for shipping it back to us. Upon receipt of the returned item, we'll issue you a 90% refund. Refund requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you.

Replacements 
We are always happy to replace defective or damaged dice. Just send us photos of the damage, and we will ship a replacement at no additional cost to you. If your item needs to be returned, we will cover the cost of the return shipping. We provide replacement pieces while titles are active in our catalog, which is typically at least a year after their initial printing. Replacement requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you.

Exchanges
Sometimes you may get a set of PolyHero Dice and realize that, even if there isn't anything wrong with them, you don't like them as much in person. That's OK! In this case, you'd cover the cost to ship them back to us, but we would ship you a new set of dice in your chosen color at no additional cost to you. Exchange requests must be made within 30 days of the date the item was delivered to you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: New PolyHero Campaign Brings New Rogues, Clerics, Warriors, and Wizards
updates.update_content:
Greetings Rogues,

We are very excited to announce that the new PolyHero Cleric Set is LIVE ON KICKSTARTER! That’s not all: This Kickstarter Includes the remastered Warrior Reforged Set & the return of our popular Wizard and Rogue sets! Now each with 2 D20s!

Greetings Rogues,
We hope that everyone is having a wonderful Friday! 
Thank you to everyone who recently completed their pledges. We appreciate your patience as we continue to ship out pledge rewards and replacements.

Greetings Rogues,

We hope everyone has stayed safe since our last update. Thank you all for being patient as we continue to ship out replacements.

Here is some exciting news for you: the PledgeManager has reopened for existing backers with incomplete pledges. No new backers will have access to the PledgeManager. Backers should be able to update shipping information and pay any remaining balances on their accounts. Some add-ons are available, but quantities are extremely limited! The PledgeManager will close again on May 29th. Orders will ship out after that date, as time is available from our fulfillment partners.

Greetings Rogues,
Thanks to everyone who stopped by our booth at PAX East! It was wonderful to see everyone. 
Our fulfillment partner in China has not returned to normal operations yet. As a result, we are shipping newly completed orders and reshipments from both our US and China fulfillment centers. It will take weeks to finish shipping all of these, so keep and eye out for tracking information during the next couple weeks.

Greetings Rogues,
All orders that were completed before the PledgeManager closed have been processed!
While shipping times from China are highly variable, shipments have been confirmed received all around the globe. If you have not received your rewards yet, you may email us at Support@PolyHero.com and we'll look into your order. It is really difficult for us to help you with your order in the comments section here, so emailing is the best way to get support.

Greetings Rogues,
Happy New Year!
We're back from our holiday break and working hard to get responses sent out to all of your emails, messages, and comments. If you still have a request pending a response from us, we ask that you remain patient just a little while longer so that we can get through all of our correspondence.

Greetings Rogues,
We just received confirmation from our fulfillment partner that our shipment has been received, inspected, and fully inventoried. They have now begun to pack orders and expect to start shipping them next week! Here's some important information:
These packages are coming from China via mail injection; depending on your region and the package, your local post office may handle the final delivery.

Greetings Rogues,
This is not a drill! We just received confirmation from our factory that the dice have completed mass production and assembly. The Team is currently working on getting logistics coordinated for cargo to depot shipping so that we can make sure the dice to you as efficiently and effectively as possible.

Greetings Rogues,
I have wonderful news for you all today! We received the latest round of Gem samples from our factory, and I'm thrilled to report that we have approved them for mass production. 
We were still able to achieve a decent amount of transparency. The worst case scenario in my last update was that we would need to make the dice completely opaque, but luckily that did not happen. We also did not end up using glow powder in the mix as it affected the overall color too much. While it was a rocky road getting to the finished product, we're really pleased with how they've ultimately come out. The color is a lovely deep ruby red and has taken to the mold very well - the facets of the gem are very sharp and defined.

campaign.story:
Miniature lights for all shapes
Grimlight are tiny magnet-controlled light circuits for miniature gaming, dungeon mastering, model trains, LARP:s and whatever else you can think of. Grimlight has the following features:
Magnetic control – switch on and off without touching the miniature
Easy to hide – 0.2 mm wiring laid either inside or on the miniature 
Switchable effects – fixed, pulsating or flickering chosen by magnet
Convenient – easy to use and install 
Small circuit – 21*2.4 mm fits in regular 28 mm miniature bases 
Small led's – 0.6 mm LED fits in a drill hole (1.8mm wide incl. wirepads)
Battery operated – using a CR1216 or CR1220 battery 
Long stand-by time – over a year
Long active time – 15 to 50 hours depending on battery, FX, lights
Flexible – 2 led's per circuit 
Any colour – paint or cover the light thinly in any colour 
SHIPPING INCLUDED, WORLDWIDE! How about that?

Reward tiers
To keep it simple there are only a few different reward tiers. For different amounts of Grimlights, just pledge in multiples of the chosen non-"early bird" tier. The regular one that we believe will be what most want is the 250 SEK tier simply called "five grimlights". For ease of handling and due to shipping cost it is only possible to get Grimlight in multiples of five. If you would like to get 15 for example, just pledge 750 SEK. The reward level "5 Grimlights with larger battery holder" are Grimlights that are modified to operate from three AAA batteries instead of from one CR1216. If you want to add lighting to something big and think it would be good with extended time (about 50 times the capacity) before needing to change batteries this is for you. If you have some special needs and ideas for the lighting you need there is also a tier where we can program custom effects for you (within the constraints of what is possible with the micro-controller we are using).

27/11: We've now added a new reward tier for 20 Grimlight's. If you want let's say 25 Grimlights you simply pledge for 5 and for 20 added together (250+950 at our normal pledge levels).
The standard reward
Stretch goals
Stretch goals!
Promotional stretch goals!
Bonus promotional stretch goals! https://www.facebook.com/grimlightmedia/
  What it looks like 
What our current Grimlight prototypes look like before installation
  Example of what can be done with a Grimlight and optic fiber
   Our first prototype from Conan by Monolith
  Prototypes leading up to final version, left is oldest.
  A Banshee with a Grimlight drilled into its torso.
  We're builders, not painters.
  One of our store displays
  An early prototype Goblin
  What the large battery holder looks like
 
How we intend to use the funds you entrust us:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Yes, we admit we're new to this. That is why we've spent a year preparing and testing. We've gone through countless prototypes and designs to find the most convenient solution. We have already ordered and tested a final prototype batch from our manufacturers in China. We've established our costs and have a solid grasp on what our pledge goals needs to be. Unless any major upsets in the market or currency balance we believe we have prepared for any eventualities.



That being said, we cannot anticipate every possible risk but we can assure you that we will work day and night to make this Kickstarter happen and make you a satisfied supporter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The BIG Guide Post! What you need if you don't know what to do.
updates.update_content:
How to use your Grimlight!
How to install and remove the battery: Be sure to use CR1220 (or CR1216 if you absolutely must have the lowest possible height) and slide it in from the side into the battery holder. The lights should blink 3 times to indicate that the circuit is working and ready to be turned on. If they don't there are two things you can do to improve connectivity. First, press lightly on top of the "wings" in the center of the battery holder to make them bend slightly downward.  If that does not improve connectivity, try using a small metal file or similar object to scrape off any oxidization on the pad below the battery holder. See the pictures below. How you remove the battery depends on how you installed the Grimlight. If you can access the circuit, simply pushing the battery gently from the side with a blunt object is enough. You can also use your magnet to remove a battery if you cant access the circuit itself (i.e. if you mounted in in a miniature base). When you mount it, you can either place it upside down for easier access to the battery or mount it so that you leave the maximum amount of space available for the battery to slide out.

campaign.story:
Gear up for adventure! RPG Player Kits enrich your tabletop experience with smart components that enhance and streamline gameplay. The RPG Player Kit includes: Action Cards, Player Dry-Erase Board, Two Color-Coded Dice Sets, Inspiration Token, and a Wooden Dice Box. The Action Cards shown are for DnD Fifth Edition (5E), but we will also produce additional Action Card sets compatible with the following: Savage Worlds, Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, and Starfinder Roleplaying Game.  Don't see your favorite RPG system on this list? Let us know! We may be able to add more compatible systems based on backer feedback.
When playing tabletop RPGs, there are lots of different actions you can take. This can be daunting for new players. Take out the guess-work and confusion. Our Action Cards provide an easy reference. Use them as a general guide or play them onto the table during your turn.
The set shown above is designed for Fifth Edition (5e); it provides cards for standard actions, movement types, bonus actions, and reactions. 5e Action Cards have the standard combat actions ("Combat Actions," Player Basic Rules, page 71)--everything from making a melee attack to casting a spell. Don't play 5th edition? Let us know what other game systems you'd like to see supported as an alternative set for this kickstarter.
If you play Savage Worlds, we will be providing an alternative set of Savage Worlds Action Cards!  It provides cards for regular actions and movement.
If you play, Pathfinder Roleplaying Game, you can get a set of action cards specific for that system:
If you play the new Starfinder Roleplaying Game, we will be making a set of Starfinder Action Cards as well:
   Remembering all your character specs and keeping them up to date can get tricky, especially when they keep changing during a fight! Our Player Dry-Erase board has everything you need to track your damage, death saves or wounds, and other notes. It's specifically designed to streamline combat and quickly provide relevant information. Change it as many times as you need in your encounters. Level up your gameplay with our Player Dry-Erase Board.
  From the latest stretch goals, we are adding flavors of Player Dry-Erase boards for Starfinder Roleplaying Game and Savage Worlds!
As artwork is completed, we'll add more in updates, here is the example for Starfinder:
   Are you spending more time hunting for the right type of die than actually playing? There are lots of different dice in role-playing games. Quickly find the right one by using our dice system. We've designed a color-coded set that makes it easy to pick the right die every time. It's great for both new players and seasoned players in order to quickly find the right die. Get multiple sets to make rolling damage rolls even easier.
    Because rolling dice is a such core part of any role-playing game, you need a place to roll that can keep the dice on the table. We are making a special laser-engraved dice box for this kickstarter. It doubles as a storage container to keep all of your player kit components. Remove the lid and use it as a dice tray.
 Reverse of lid has laser engraving of a rpg dice set for reference:
    $8.5k UNLOCKED: Inspiration Token
Many games use a bonus to help track player perks such as Inspiration for DnD 5E or bennies (benefits) for Savage Worlds. If we reach this stretch goal, we will automatically be adding bonus Inspiration Tokens to all RPG Player Kits as well as making them available as an add-on!  Each RPG Player Kit will come with one bonus Inspiration Token.  Need more?  Checkout our add-on section for 5-packs!
$9k UNLOCKED: Cover Art
For this stretch goal, we will be adding Cover Art to the sets of Action Cards!  We will be working with Printable Heroes.  Printable Heroes makes awesome paper miniatures--go check out the patreon!
  $9.5k UNLOCKED: Roll With Advantage
To improve the experience, every RPG Player Kit will come with a second set of Color-coded dice.  This will ensure that you can pull dice to easily roll for advantage/disadvantage, break out that wild die for Savage Worlds for every d6 roll, and provide extra dice to easily roll damage.
$10k UNLOCKED: Savage Worlds and Starfinder Dry-Erase Boards
Need to track shaken and wounds for your Savage Worlds wild card? Or track stamina and resolve points as well as kinetic and energy armor class for your Starfinder pilot? By popular demand, we are adding two additional Player Dry-Erase boards specific for Starfinder Roleplaying Game and Savage Worlds.
Want to add more to your kit? Choose a base reward level and increase your pledge according to the add-on you would like.  See the list of add-ons below.  For example, add $10 to receive an additional kit component (Action Card Set, Player Dry-Erase Board, or Color-Coded Dice Set). Increase your pledge by $25 for each additional Wooden Dice Box you would like to add. We will be following up with surveys after the kickstarter to gather the information for your add-on selections.
*Complete RPG Player Kit includes: Wooden Dice Box, Action Cards, Player Dry-Erase Board, 2x Color-Coded Dice Sets, and one Inspiration Token
Getting your entire gaming group geared up?  Get 5-packs at reduced cost!
DnD 5E Condition and Combat Cards
You may have seen our previous kickstarter for DnD 5E Condition and Combat Cards. We are making these decks available as add-ons for the current kickstarter.
If you don't want to wait for 5E Condition and Combat Cards as a kickstarter add-on and would like to get these decks separately, these decks are available to order now:
  DnD 5E Condition Cards
Your barbarian got poisoned? Your cleric was blinded? Give players the corresponding condition card to use as a reference. Return the card when the condition is removed. Quickly and easily track fifth edition conditions for your own role-playing and tabletop adventure!
DnD 5E Condition Cards is a 52 card deck that contains thirteen unique conditions for up to four players. The deck contains the standard 5E conditions (Appendix A: Conditions, page 105). Each deck has four copies of each condition to cover your party. Contains four of each: Blinded, Charmed, Deafened, Frightened, Grappled, Incapacitated, Invisible, Paralyzed, Petrified, Poisoned, Restrained, Stunned, Unconscious
DnD 5E Combat Cards
Roll for initiative! Quickly and easily track combat for your 5E RPG experience. Great for new adventurers or as a reference for seasoned heroes.
DnD 5E Combat Cards are geared for tracking rules when engaged in combat (Chapter 9: Combat, page 74). This full-color 52 card deck complements and enhances your fifth edition encounters for your own role-playing and tabletop adventure! Contains four cards each: Cover, Concentration, Dying, Exhaustion, Flanking, Hidden, Incorporeal, Mounted, Prone, Underwater and six cards each: Death Saves and Initiative Cards.
 DnD 5E Bonus Cards are three additional card types which provide: Inspiration Bonus Cards (set of four), Intoxicated Bonus Condition Cards (set of four), and Extended Initiative Cards (six cards numbered 7 to 12) which provides initiative cards beyond the standard DnD 5E Combat Card deck.
     Looking for ways to help? Share this kickstarter with friends!
                 Feedback
We would very much like to engage the community to improve this project during the kickstarter. Have an idea or want to see a specific thing added to the kit? Provide your feedback here:
     Connect with Us!
Feel free to comment here on the kickstarter, visit our website, tweet at us, like us on facebook, checkout out our youtube channel, join our mailing list or connect with us on your favorite social media platform. We'd love to share more and hear from you all!
    Wholesale
Are you a business such as a game store or a distributor? Please contact us directly for special pricing: sales@critgames.com
Kicktraq
    Disclaimer
We are not affiliated, associated, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Wizards of the Coast or its parent company, Hasbro, Inc. Dungeons and Dragons (also known as D&D), Dungeon Master (also known as DM) are registered trademarks of Wizards of the Coast.
DnD 5e Condition and Combat Cards and 5e Action Cards are licensed under the Open Game License 1.0a.
Pathfinder and Starfinder Roleplaying Games are copyright Paizo Inc.  All Action Cards utilize the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Compatibility License or Starfinder Roleplaying Game Compatibility License respectively; products are licensed under the Open Game License (OGL).
Savage Worlds is copyright Pinnacle Entertainment Group. Products are official licensed products for Savage Worlds.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have fully produced quality tabletop accessories for our own table and would love to bring them to yours! Checkout out our previous kickstarter project DnD 5e Condition and Combat Cards (see https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/critgames/5e-rpg-condition-cards).

We have worked with artists and manufacturers to bring projects together, but as always timings and delays can arise. We'll do our best and will try to make things right. Ultimately if something can't be delivered for some reason, we will be happy to refund pledges.

We are a small, indie game developer and we've poured a good amount of love into this product to bring a great game experience. If you are interested to see more of these types of tabletop products please consider sharing it with friends!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Binwin’s Minions is an online comic by Tavis Maiden and Cory Casoni based on the famed Dungeons and Dragons character, Binwin Bronzebottom, created by Eisner and Harvey award winning cartoonist Scott Kurtz. The comic follows Binwin as he attempts to teach four level-none Minions what it means to be adventurers. In return, they'll teach Binwin what it means to be a family... or something.
This Kickstarter collects the first season of Binwin’s Minions into the gloriously antiquated hardcopy format. But have no fear digiphiles, you can read Binwin’s Minions every Friday on TableTitans.com where it is permanently entombed in the interwebs.
  Only the mightiest, fightiest, dwarfiest, dwarf to ever wield an axe. Binwin Bronzebottom has lived an epic life and is known far and wide by many names: Bane of the Frost Giants, Puncher of Dragons, Slayer of Ale, the list is extensive. He has traveled the land on many dangerous quests and acquired more loot than any one dwarf can spend, unless that dwarf happens to be named Binwin… because he spent it all and now he’s broke. A little older but not much wiser, Binwin has set out to assemble a group of fresh-faced adventurers to take on all the risks while he reaps all the rewards.
  Unlike Binwin, there’s not much to say about the Minions. There’s a Warrior, a Wizard, a Druid, and a Thief, but don’t bother learning their names--they’ll all be dead by the time you finish reading this.
  Beautiful books designed by famed art director, Keith Wood, in both a Softcover Retail editions and a glorious Collector's Hardcover. There are also Extras and Add-ons, but seriously get dem books!
                          To each their own! Pick the loot that's right for you. There's a ton of Add-ons to fully customize your experience. 
Simply pick the reward tier you'd like, then add to your pledge the amount listed in the chart below for any items you'd like to "add-on" as an additional reward! 
              Once the campaign is over, we'll use the Wizards at BackerKit and their magical Surveys to get shirt sizes and make sure you get the Add-on items that you wanted. You can mix and match to your hearts content and get exactly the combination of rewards you desire!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always risks when publishing books and manufacturing products. Everything from paper and fabric shortages to coastal pirates... yes, pirates.

But have no fear (except from pirates) because this will be our FOURTH successful Kickstarter in as many years here at Toonhound Studios. Though each one has had its share of challenges, they've all been fulfilled or are in the process of being fulfilled to throngs of happy Backers :)

We've got a dedicated staff and partners at various printers and manufacturers ready to receive our files, print our goodies, and get them shipped straight to your door. And, as always, we've teamed with one of the biggest and best crowdfunding companies in the industry: BackerKit.

Each of our Kickstarter Backers receives a BackerKit account, and through it we can easily manage add-ons, surveys, address changes, and fulfillment. This gives you direct access to all of us at Toonhound Studios AND all of our stuff for this Kickstarter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
This is it, gang, the final day of the Binwin’s Minions V1 Kickstarter campaign and because of all your help we’re ALREADY FUNDED WITH 30 HOURS TO GO!
Your hard work on those Milestone Challenges has already paid off and we’ve unlocked our First Stretch Goal, so all Backers will be receiving a digital copy of the Binwin Bronzebottom D&D Adventure Module written by Scott Kurtz.

updates.update_userinfo: APOLOGIES & UPDATES + LAST WEEK OF BACKERKIT BEFORE SHIPPING!
updates.update_content:
It took a couple extra days to get there but we got over 1000 shares of your poor little Minions meeting their inevitable demise. And those shares spurred not 500 but 600 total Backers to the Campaign!
Congratulations everyone! We’ll be sending out high-res versions of the Binwin’s Minions On the Road Print to all Reward Tiers and adding a Printed version to all Reward Tiers that include the Print Sets & Sticker Sheets.

You're serving Binwin well but, being a Minion sent on ridiculous missions, you'll ultimately meet an untimely demise.
MILESTONE #3 - RIP MINIONS
Challenge: Let's get 1000 shares and 500 total Backers by the end of the campaign! Tell us in on sentence how your minions met their end on Facebook or Twitter using the #BinwinComic hashtag and link!

We’ve got a new Reward Tier!
Carry your D&D dice in style with the all-new Hex Chests Remastered: Artisan Dice Box from our good friends at Elderwood Academy. Featuring six different woods to choose from and inlayed with EXCLUSIVE designs by Binwin creator Scott Kurtz!
